column3: Good, you guys are all here
Well, I have a job interview at Ralph Lauren tomorrow
I got this pair marked excess, I gotta tell ya, there was no room for excess anything in there
Anyway, I'm going to be the coordinator of the woman's collection, I'll work right under the director, it's the perfect, perfect job for me
Well, if you nail the interview, you'll get it
You wanna work on your interview skills
All right, let's start with the handshake
Very good handshake, good wrist action
What did I ever do to you
Did I squeeze it too hard
Let's just say, I'm glad I'm not Chandler
That's right Ross, I can see you in your new apartment
Same as yesterday,  same as the day before
Is he doing his shark attack bit yet
Oh no-no-no, I wasn't waving at you lady
Hey, Monica, this totally hot girl in Ross's building is flirting with me
Let's see, she's on the third floor…
Oh no-no-no, I'm not with her, she's just Monica
Ooh-ooh, go by the window you can pretend to be surfing
But I counted, you're not supposed to live here
I ended up at Ross's place
Oh, I musta missed counted or something
Oh, l-l-look, Ross is doing his 'Watching TV' bit
No Joey, I think he's just watchin' TV
We've lost visual contact with the suspect
Okay, now I've really have to go
But it's just so unfair that our date has to get cut short just 'cause some guy shot at a store clerk
I know, but it's my job, sweethart
Okay, then maybe I can come too
Suspect has just emerged naked from the sewer
Oh I just miss him so much
For just a week you guys are really close, huh
I can't help it though he's so sweet, he's like this little puppy dog, y'know
But like a really tough one that shots bad guys
Ohh, I just love beginning parts of relationships, y'know
You just like can't keep your hands off each other
I know it is the best
So-so how long did that last for you and Chandler
I-I am serious, I mean, we're, we're all over each other all the time
Okay, you know where you are better than I do
What don't you just calm down Phoebe
Why don’t you just get all your facts before you run around telling everybody that you're the only hot couple
I was wrong obviously, I just—I misspoke
Oh no, it is okay, I mean as long as you know that Chandler and I are also very hot and fiery, just as hot as you
I mean our flame, whew, is on fire
Hey Monica, here's your broom back
Oh hey, how'd the interview go
I did the stupidest, most embarrassing thing
Did you tell the guy you wanted to have sex with his wife and then fall right out of your chair
And-and the interview part went so well, y'know
He said something about a boat and I was like, "Well, yeah
If you've got enough life jackets
"  Trust me, it was actually, it was very funny
Anyway, so we were saying good-bye and ugh
All right, we were shaking hands and he kinda leaned toward me… Y'know maybe he was going to open the door, but I totally miss read him and I uhhh…
Well, I didn't know what else to do
Well you coulda tried, not kissing him
Hey Rach, a guy from Ralph Lauren called, you got a second interview
I bet that kiss isn't looking like such a big mistake now, is it
What-what, wait a minute, you don't think that's why he wants me back
I accidentally kissed him in the interview, and now he wants me back y'know of course, 'cause "Let's bring the girl back who kisses everybody
What if he thinks I'm the kind of girl that-that would just sleep with him
He probably wants you back because you're right for the job
I-I don't know—Oh God, how could I be so stupid
Oh Rachel look, don't say that, I think you just need a hug from Joey
Ohh, well I'm not totally back yet, but thank you
Okay, wait there, I'll be over in a second
I gotta check out this hot girl
I lived with you guys for a while and then I found this place
Uhh do you happen to have a hot girl in there
Uhh, is-is your mommy, or sister, or babysitter by any chance a hot girl
It's really nice to see you again
All right, okay-okay, I see, I see what's going on here
Now listen, look-look, I'm sorry if I gave you the wrong impression, but I am not some hussy who will just sleep around to get ahead
Now even though I , hey-hey-hey, even though I kissed you, that does not give you the right to demand sex from me
I do not want, this job that bad
Ugh, you will not believe what that sleaze-ball from Ralph Lauren did too me
You got ink on your lip
So what do you say, maybe sometime I hold your gun
I don't know man, we're really not supposed to do that
Phoebe, do you want to go see a movie after dinner tonight
Oh we can't, we already have plans
Well, same thing we did all day, hang out at Gary's apartment
He is so amazing, we never left the bedroom
But have fun at the movie
Oh, we're not seeing a movie
Then why did you ask us if we wanted to go
Oh umm, that's because I just wanted to y'know walk in on me and Chandler while we were, y'know, doing it all night
Will you excuse me for just a second
Can I see you for a second
We have got to beat them
'Cause, Gary and Phoebe think they're a hotter couple than we are
So we've got to go upstairs and have a lot of sex to prove them wrong
Monica, you have got to stop this competitive thing
} I mean, just impress Gary and Phoebe we have to go upstairs and have sex over and over and I'm saying no to this, why
You should check this out, tell the other tenants
Apparently he's running around looking for some kind of a hot girl
I don't, I don't think we've meet
You're the guy who wouldn't chip in for the handyman
No, I-I actually thought it was unfair the way everyone reacted
I mean you had just moved in
Jen, I know this may sound a little… But uh, would you maybe wanna grab a cup of coffee sometime, or…
I will give you a call
Phoebe and Gary are so gonna hear about this at dinner
No one is hotter than we are
Isn't that the girl that waved at you the other day
But I can see through your sheet
Doesn't matter, I'm never gonna get to meet her anyway
Because it's impossible to find her apartment
She lives in some like of hot girl parallel universe, or something
She obviously lives on the second floor, seventh apartment from the left
She lives on the third floor, eighth apartment from the left
No, those first two windows,  that's the lobby
And y'know the other one over there, that's the stairway
I can't believe I almost lost another girl because of counting
Sure, I'll just get my coat
Ah, first, I-I would like to say thank you for agreeing to see me again
That's quite all right, but I feel obligated to tell you that this meeting is being videotaped
Umm, well, first I would like to start by apologizing for kissing you and uh, for yelling at you
Now you're probably going to hire one of the people who did not ah,  who did, who did not umm, yell at you and storm out, and I think that's a big mistake and here's why
I made a huge fool of myself and I came back, that shows courage
When I thought you wanted sex in exchange for this job, I said no
And, I was not afraid to stand up for myself and that shows courage
Okay umm, now I know I already said courage, but y'know you gotta have courage
And umm, and finally when I thought you were making sexual advances in the workplace, I said no and I was not litigious
{By the way, litigious means to want to litigate and litigate is to make a lawsuit against
So she didn't want to sue him
Don't worry, I had to look it up too
} So there you go, you got, you got  courage, you got integrity, you got  courage again, and not litigious
I really, really want this job and I think, I think I would be really good at it
I may regret this but uh, I'm going to give you a shot
Oh… Oh, would it be completely inappropriate to give you a hug
Okay, well then how about a handshake
I did not mean to touch that—I mean you there
Uhh, okay, so thank-thank you, I'm going to leave now thank you very much uh-huh, thank you so—Hey
You better believe he's tired, after the day we had
If you know what I mean
Honey, the tortilla chips know what you mean
So uh Chandler, you like that badge I got you
Now I gotta go, Officer Bing has gotta, 10-100
Phoebe, you have a, a twig in your hair
Ohh,  umm, we kinda took a little detour on the way over here
Yeah, we took a little stroll in the park and no one was around, so…
We violated Section 12 Paragraph 7 of the criminal code
Excuse me for just a second
You see I've always found the men's bathroom very sexual
And if I did, I don't think we'd be going out
Come on, we can't let them win
Ugh, we have already proved that we are hot
So why-why are you getting so obsessed about this thing
Because Phoebe and Gary are in that-can't-keep-their-hands-off-each-other-doing-it-in-the-park phase
I feel really sad that we're not…really there anymore
Is that what this all have been about
Wasn't it a lot more exciting when we were y'know all over each other all the time
But to tell you the truth, I'm more excited about where we are right now
I've never been in a relationship that's lasted this long before
Y'know to get past the beginning and still be around each other all the time, I think that's pretty incredible
And the fact that this is happening all with you, yeah I think that's pretty exciting
I know that I was acting a little crazy but umm, I feel the same way
You just freaked out about our relationship
Okay, I freaked out a little
I am the relationship and king and you are the crazy, irrational screw up
I cannot believe Ross is buying this
You guys ready fore the movies
Oh by the way, thank you for loaning us Pamela and Yasmine
